subSections.title: Glyph origin
Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* {{q|Cantonese}} Not to be confused with {{zh-l|喺|tr=hai2}}.
* {{q|Cantonese|Hakka}} {{lang|zh|係／系}} is used in vernacular contexts, while {{zh-l|是}} is used in literary or formal contexts.
